item.title: Những vấn đề về Code
item.description: Reading Binary File void readingFile() { int n = 0; int *a; ifstream fin; fin.open("output.bin", ios::binary); if (fin.is_open()) { fin.seekg(4, ios::beg); fin.read((char*)&n, sizeof(n)); } fin.close(); }
